output_list.criticism: The sell function allows attackers to sell arbitrarily large amounts of the digital assets of a user, due to a lack of a sufficient check between the amount of digital assets a user has and the amount they are trying to sell. This vulnerability can lead to financial losses for the user and the contract owner.
The transfer function does not check if the sender has enough balance before transferring the tokens. This vulnerability can lead to financial losses for the sender and the contract owner.
The reward function does not check if the sender has enough balance before transferring the tokens. This vulnerability can lead to financial losses for the sender and the contract owner.
The transferReward function does not check if the sender has enough balance before transferring the tokens. This vulnerability can lead to financial losses for the sender and the contract owner.
The unlockReward function does not check if the sender has enough balance before transferring the tokens. This vulnerability can lead to financial losses for the sender and the contract owner.
The buy function does not check if the contract has enough balance before transferring the tokens. This vulnerability can lead to financial losses for the contract owner.
